data.title: Colleges of Medicine, Pharmacy & Graduate Studies
data.meta_description: Pursue your Doctor of Medicine (M.D.) or Doctor of Pharmacy (Pharm.D.) degree, in addition to Master’s and Ph.D degrees and medical research opportunities.
data.text:
Ignite Magazine

Slowing the progress of Parkinson’s Disease

In the new issue, we explore how NEOMED researchers, faculty members and students are working to slow or stop the progression of Parkinson’s.

Ignite magazine

Northeast Ohio Medical University ranks among top 25 in the nation for diversity

NEOMED is ranked among the Top 25 “Most Diverse Medical Schools” in the nation, according to U.S. News & World Report in its 2024 Best Medical Schools publication. Furthermore, NEOMED was ranked as the second-most diverse medical school in Ohio and recognized as a U.S. News Best Graduate School.
